怎樣才算贏勇士？
1. 要在勇士顛峰期全球員無病無痛情況下打定勝負
2.要在勇士內部沒有矛盾的時候打
3.要在CURRY狀態最好的時候打
4.你不能往禁區射球或入樽上籃
5.你不能遠射3分進球
6.你不能快速反擊，你要全隊都攻出來打陣地戰
7.你不能壓迫式防守，要給勇士球員足夠的空間發揮
8.你不能聯防
9.在你的主場，你不能有主場哨，裁判要偏向勇士，最好一開場就給主隊主力畢業離場
10.CURRY帶球，你不能幾個球員去攔截，要讓CURRY順利射3分球
11.你不能偷CURRY球
12.Curry後手出界要係勇士波
13.你不能找比CURRY高的球員防守他
14.你應該自願瘋狂比勇士球員踢J 唔準罰佢停賽 直至踢到你J爆為至止
15.勇士唔可以有人傷, 對家絕對要傷幾件. 其次 球證必須要由勇士安排
16.累積F1 F2 都不能停賽，否則視為黑
17.當家球星要一個人拎既分數 籃版 偷波 封波 各樣都係 對面全隊加埋既總和
18.除非對方有球員重傷，否則任何動作都不算犯規
19.你只能拍住幾十萬美金嘅隊友上陣
20.你進的球前要把勇士每個隊員都過一遍，最好連球證都過一遍，然後再把球射進，這樣才是真水平，否則勇士認為是靠運氣
21.你防守籃板球後在本方禁區不能長傳到前場
22.你要允許勇士的教練中場休息和裁判交流
23.務必遵守以上守則，否則即使你不小心贏球了，勇士迷也會說你是勝之不武，說你是靠運氣，說你無恥。勇士迷總是可以找到一條理由來說明你不應該贏球。

湖人總裁魔術強森再次因為涉嫌違規招募球員，遭NBA罰款5萬美元。

這一次，是魔術在接受採訪時盛讚公鹿之星字母哥，稱他有望帶隊拿到總冠軍。魔術說：「他會成為MVP，會成為總冠軍的。他會帶領公鹿成為強隊，為他們帶來一個冠軍。」而他的言論也被公鹿官方社群帳號轉載，來鼓勵球迷。

LeBron James Calls Warriors Report 'Non-Story'

LeBron James addressed a report that he would consider signing with the Warriors in the offseason.

With James hitting free agency this offseason and his future with the Cavaliers in doubt, he pleaded with reporters to no longer ask him questions about other teams.

James has also been linked with the Rockets and Lakers this season.

"The Golden State conversation is a non-story," said James. "All the other conversations is a non-story. My focus right now is on this team and trying to figure out how we can get back to a fourth NBA Finals and compete for a championship. Everything else.. if it's not about this team, if you want to ask me about this team, I can answer it good, bad or ugly. But please, for the rest of the season, don't ask me about no other team unless we're competing against them the next night or if you want to ask me about a highlight that happened the night before. Don't ask me about being on the team or another team because it's unfair to my teammates here, my 14 teammates that we come to work hard for, this coaching staff and this fan base."

LeBron James Calls Warriors Report 'Non-Story'

LeBron James addressed a report that he would consider signing with the Warriors in the offseason.

With James hitting free agency this offseason and his future with the Cavaliers in doubt, he pleaded with reporters to no longer ask him questions about other teams.

James has also been linked with the Rockets and Lakers this season.

"The Golden State conversation is a non-story," said James. "All the other conversations is a non-story. My focus right now is on this team and trying to figure out how we can get back to a fourth NBA Finals and compete for a championship. Everything else.. if it's not about this team, if you want to ask me about this team, I can answer it good, bad or ugly. But please, for the rest of the season, don't ask me about no other team unless we're competing against them the next night or if you want to ask me about a highlight that happened the night before. Don't ask me about being on the team or another team because it's unfair to my teammates here, my 14 teammates that we come to work hard for, this coaching staff and this fan base."

LeBron James Calls Warriors Report 'Non-Story'

LeBron James addressed a report that he would consider signing with the Warriors in the offseason.

With James hitting free agency this offseason and his future with the Cavaliers in doubt, he pleaded with reporters to no longer ask him questions about other teams.

James has also been linked with the Rockets and Lakers this season.

"The Golden State conversation is a non-story," said James. "All the other conversations is a non-story. My focus right now is on this team and trying to figure out how we can get back to a fourth NBA Finals and compete for a championship. Everything else.. if it's not about this team, if you want to ask me about this team, I can answer it good, bad or ugly. But please, for the rest of the season, don't ask me about no other team unless we're competing against them the next night or if you want to ask me about a highlight that happened the night before. Don't ask me about being on the team or another team because it's unfair to my teammates here, my 14 teammates that we come to work hard for, this coaching staff and this fan base."

「我們知道我們需要彼此，」Simmons說。

「他喜歡鼓動現場的觀眾的情緒，在社交媒體上打打嘴仗，我一般只是看著因為這不是我的性格，」Simmons說。「同時，我會為他而戰 （I'd go to battle for him）」。
